name: VIAMetroTransit
0:
”Alexa, ask VIA Metro when the next bus leaves from stop 46637”
”Alexa, ask VIA Metro when route 75 leaves from stop 92399”
”Alexa, ask VIA Metro for information about bus stop 46637”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: via metro
des:
The VIA Metro Skill provides real-time bus information for San Antonio, Texas and surrounding areas within the VIA Metropolitan Transit service area. Receive information about next buses arriving at a specific stop, location of a specific stop, and bus routes departing from a specific stop along with a brief weather forecast.
 
Give Alexa a try using…
Route Number 20 and Stop ID 46637 – Stop ID numbers are found on VIA bus stop signs.

Next Buses at a Specific Stop:
 Tells the user the next 3 buses at a stop including arrival times.
 Sample phrases:
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro what's the next bus at stop {stop ID}?
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro when does the next bus leave from stop {stop ID}?
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro when is a bus at stop {stop ID}?
 

More Information About a Specific Stop:
 Tells the user the name/intersection of a stop ID.
 Sample phrases:
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro to tell me information about stop {stop ID}.
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro to tell me about stop {stop ID}.
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro about bus stop {stop ID}.
 

Route Arrival at a Specific Stop:
 Tells the user arrival information at a specific stop along with a brief forecast.
 Sample phrases:
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro when does route {route number} leave from stop {stop ID}?
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro when is bus {route number} at bus stop {stop ID}?
 • Alexa, ask VIA Metro when {route number} leaves bus stop {stop ID}?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
